alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 17 at 3:03PM PDT until June 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
